overview: This is a once in a generation event that needs to be examined without the usual spin that is delivered by the controlled media. While the video will be interpreted one way or the other, it is one that supports the voice of reason and of peace rather than jingoistic war drums and the cacophony of white noise.
tagline: A once in a generation event that must be examined without the usual spin from controlled media.
title: Till the Last Ukranian
